messages.messageBody:
that is really funny! kids are great my son has sure lightened me up!

lol,
susan
austin,tx

> How cute! Sounds like summer social time, to me! Our area is full
of
> Catholic churches that host big socials through the summer. :) I
took my
> son, John, who is almost 6, to a church named St. John's. Now, he
refers to
> it as "his" church! ~Karen

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] funny: thought from my ds
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/30/00 12:12:55 PM Central Daylight Time, fxfireob@flash.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/30/00 12:12:55 PM Central Daylight Time,
fxfireob@... writes:

<< i had to pass this on. rene', my 4+ yos, turned to me and said 'mom i
want to go to church' and i said 'sure which one?' he said 'the one
where you get chicken and mash potatoes' - i guess this falls under
'the way to man heart is through his stomach' <g>

>>
How cute! Sounds like summer social time, to me! Our area is full of
Catholic churches that host big socials through the summer. :) I took my
son, John, who is almost 6, to a church named St. John's. Now, he refers to
it as "his" church! ~Karen
